all_text_content:
Verse of the Day
And ye must give thanks unto God in the Spirit for whatsoever blessing ye are blessed with.
Doctrine and Covenants 46:32
Quote of the Day
"Spiritual submissiveness … is beautiful, powerful, and transformational."
Ulisses Soares | 1 Oct 2024General Conference
